text: Michel Ries (born 11 March 1998) is a Luxembourgish cyclist, who currently rides for UCI WorldTeam . In October 2020, he was named in the startlist for the 2020 Vuelta a España. ==Major results== ;2015 : 2nd Time trial, National Junior Road Championships ;2016 : National Junior Road Championships ::1st 20px Time trial ::1st 20px Road race ;2017 : 2nd Time trial, National Under-23 Road Championships ;2018 : 3rd Time trial, National Under-23 Road Championships : 9th Overall Giro Ciclistico d'Italia : 10th Overall Tour de l'Avenir ;2019 : 1st Stage 3 Giro della Valle d'Aosta : 7th Overall Tour de l'Avenir : 9th Overall Giro di Sicilia ;2020 : 1st 20px Time trial, National Under-23 Road Championships ===Grand Tour general classification results timeline=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col" | Grand Tour ! scope="col" | 2020 |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A pink jersey Giro d'Italia |— |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A yellow jersey Tour de France |— |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A red jersey Vuelta a España |IP |} {| class="wikitable" |+ Legend |- ! scope="row" | — | Did not compete |- ! scope="row" | DNF | Did not finish |} == References == ==External links== * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Luxembourgian male cyclists Category:Vuelta a España cyclists
title: Michel Ries
